channel.title: Backbone on Caleb Jay's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Backbone on Caleb Jay's Blog

item.title: Good Breakdown of Backbone
item.description: At Electric Imp we use a Backbone / Marionette stack, so when I’m not churning through bugs I do what I can to learn the frameworks. I found this great tutorial that demonstrates not only how to use Backbone, but also the best way to use it - The Backbone Primer. Slowly but surely I’ll try to implement a simple app mirroring our stack at this simple Backbone project repo.
